    • LIMIT_SECURITY_BREACH

      public static final String LIMIT_SECURITY_BREACH
      User tries to write tenant data outside the defined limits. For example a watchlist may have a maximum of instruments, if it is exceeded then this exception thrown.

    • uDFPrefixSuffixMap

      public static final Map<UDFDataType,BaseConstants.UDFPrefixSuffix> uDFPrefixSuffixMap
      Defines the maximum values for user-defined input fields. The validation of these values should also be carried out in the frontend.
